net.sf.jgcs.spi

Class AbstractProtocol<P extends AbstractProtocol<P,DS,CS,G>,DS extends AbstractDataSession<P,DS,CS,G>,CS extends AbstractControlSession<P,DS,CS,G>,G extends GroupConfiguration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jgcs.spi.AbstractProtocol<P,DS,CS,G>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Protocol
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPollingProtocol

    public abstract class AbstractProtocol<P extends AbstractProtocol<P,DS,CS,G>,DS extends AbstractDataSession<P,DS,CS,G>,CS extends AbstractControlSession<P,DS,CS,G>,G extends GroupConfiguration>
extends Object
implements Protocol
    This class defines a AbstractProtocol It partially implements a protocol with the mappings between a configuration and a pair of control and data sessions.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nuno Carvalho

    • Method Detail

      • openDataSession

        public DataSession openDataSession(GroupConfiguration group)
                            throws GroupException
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Obtains a data session for a group. This session must be used to send messages and to register a listener to receive messages from the other members of the group. A new session is created if it does not yet exist. Otherwise, the existing session is returned.
        Specified by:
        openDataSession in interface Protocol
        Parameters:
        group - the configuration.
        Returns:
        the data session.
        Throws:
        GroupException - a protocol specific exception.

      • openControlSession

        public ControlSession openControlSession(GroupConfiguration group)
                                  throws GroupException
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Obtains a control session for a group. This session must be used to join and leave the group, as well as, to obtain information on current membership. A new session is created if it does not yet exist. Otherwise, the existing session is returned.
        Specified by:
        openControlSession in interface Protocol
        Parameters:
        group - the configuration.
        Returns:
        the control session.
        Throws:
        GroupException - a protocol specific exception.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Close this protocol. This will close all existing associated sessions and prevent any other from being opened. It will release all resources used by the protocol.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Protocol
        Throws:
        IOException

        public boolean isClosed()
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Check if this protocol has been closed.
        Specified by:
        isClosed in interface Protocol
        Returns:
        true if already closed
